Literature.Title: Potent Antiviral Activity against HSV-1 and SARS-CoV-2 by Antimicrobial Peptoids.

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=73 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=224 µg/ml,Murine macrophage cells J774A.1:10% Killing=45 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli(MIC=145.0µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=1.8µg/ml),Candida albicans SC5314(MIC=14.0µg/ml),Proteus vulgaris ATCC 49132(MIC=43.0µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=10.8µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis ATCC 35659(MIC=172µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 33495(MIC=10.8µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes ATCC 35029(MIC=>172µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=10.8µg/ml),Serratia marcescens ATCC 13880(MIC=172µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=5.4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=5.4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NRS 100(MIC=5.4µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=10.8µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=21.6µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium(MIC=5.4µg/ml),Mycobacterium bovis BCG(MIC=6.3µM),Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(MIC=6.6µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(no activity data),HSV-1(70-80% REP=20µg/ml)
